comment.caption: Metropolitan opera star Elenor Steber attended the 1949 "Carnegie Hall" Christmas Concert with her husband Edwin L. Billy
comment.note: Metropolitan opera star Elenor Steber and husband Edwin L. Billy among the crowd of celebrities and friends from all walks of life--including some of the greatest names in the world of music--who came to hear Margaret Truman make her New York debut at the "Carnegie Hall" Christmas 1949 concert. From: Papers of E. Clifton and Margaret Truman Daniel
